title: Constructivist Learning Experience Design to Improve Nursing Students' Learning Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: The need to establish a customized educational environment reflecting the social contexts (self-development, workplace experience) of adult learners aged 40 and above.

learning_goals: Learners can establish personalized learning plans by applying a constructivist approach
Learners can reconstruct the meaning of learning experiences through self-reflection and peer feedback
Learners can explain the integrated understanding of theory and practice through classroom-field linkage activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
